files

Class Decompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • files.Decompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccessFlags, ConstantTags

    public class Decompiler
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccessFlags, ConstantTags
    This class ties all the Attributes, Constants, Methods, and Fields together Doesn't currently decompile into source code Uses reflection
